verses.1: Jessiʼ tapa David, milianpi a suak mipa, Jakobʼ Pasianʼ sathau nilh pa, Israel laphuak siampa Davidʼ kam nunungte hih bang ahi hi:
verses.2: “ Topaʼ kha in kei tungtawnin thu hong gen a, ka kam sungah ama thugente om hi.
verses.3: Israel Pasian kampau khin a, Israel a hupa in kei kiangah hong ci khin hi: Mi khat in mite tungah thutang takin ukin Pasian zahtakna tawh limtakin a uk ciangin
verses.4: amah pen amaute tungah zingsang khuavak bangin taang ziazua a, meii kaai loh ni zingsang a nitaang khia, leilak panin lopate a selsak guahtui tawh kibang hi.
verses.5: Hi hi, ka innkuan zong Pasian tawh tua bangmah hi lo ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in tawntung thuciamna kei tawh hong bawl a, na khempeuh a hoih a kipin hih hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah hong huhin, ka deihna khempeuh tangtungsak ding hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.6: Ahih hangin migilote ahihleh a kilawn khia lingkungte tawh kibang hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh khut guak tawh amaute kilawng ngam lo a,
verses.7: amaute a lawng ding mipa pen sik le teipi bul tawh kithawi a, amaute mei tawh kihal tum siang hi,” a ci hi.
verses.8: Davidʼ neih mi thahatteʼ minte: Tahkhemon mi Josheb-basshebeth hi a, amah pen mi thumte a ukpa ahi hi. Amah in a teipi tawh mihing za giat do-in hun khat sungin that mangkhin hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin mi thahat thumte lakah amah a zom pa pen Ahoah mi Dodoʼ tapa Eleazar ahi hi. Galsim dingin a kikaikhawm Filistia-te to a, Israel mite a nungkik hunin David tawh amah om hi.
verses.10: Amah dingin a khut a hikcip mateng Filistia-te sat tuk a, a namsau a khut sungah omcip hi. Topa in tua ni-in gualzawhna lianpi piangsak a, a kithat miteʼ na a tawm ding bekin ama nungah mite hong paikik uh hi.
verses.11: Ama zomah Harar mi Ageeʼ tapa Shammah ahi hi. Besan a dimna mun Lehi ah Filistia-te kikaikhawm uh a, Filistia-teʼ kiang panin mite tai uh hi.
verses.12: Ahih hangin amah in tua munah panmun la-in hu a, Filistia-te that a, Topa in gualzawhna lianpi a piangsak hi.
verses.13: Ukpa sawm thumte lak panin mi thumte pai sukin, Refaim kuamah Filistia mihonte in giahphual satin a om laitakin, Adullam leihawm a David kiangah anlak hun pawlin tung uh hi.
verses.14: Tua hunin mun muanhuai sungah David om a, Filistia khuacingte Bethlehem ah om uh hi.
verses.15: David in lunggulhna tawh, “Kulh kongpi gei-a om Bethlehem tuikhuk panin mi khat in tui dawn ding kei hong pia leh!” a ci hi.
verses.16: Tua ciangin mi thahat thumte in Filistia-teʼ giahphual phulin kulh kongpi gei-a om Bethlehem tuikhuk panin tui tawi khia uh a, a tui la-in David kiangah paipih uh hi. Ahih hangin David in a tui dawn lo hi. Amah in Topa adingin a tui sung a,
verses.17: “ Topa aw, hih tui ka dawn het kei ding hi. Amauʼ nuntakna khamin a pai miteʼ sisan a dawn tawh ka kibang hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in dawn lo hi. Mi thahat thumteʼ han zia tu-a bang ahi hi.
verses.18: Tu-in Zeruiahʼ tapa, Joabʼ sanggampa Abishai, mihing sawm thumte a ukpa ahi hi. Amah in a teipi tawh mihing za thumte do-in amaute that a, mihing sawm thumteʼ banah minphatna ngah beh hi.
verses.19: Mihing sawm thumte sung pan amah a minthang pen hi a, amaute a ukpa a suak hi. Ahih hangin amah in mihing thumte ban nai lo hi.
verses.20: Jehoiadaʼ tapa, Kabzeel khuami Benaiah pen gal a hang, na lianpite a sem pa hi a, amah in Moab galhang mi nih a vat hi. Amah zong pai sukin vuk a kiat ni khatin leihawm sunga om humpinelkai khat a that hi.
verses.21: Amah in a melhoih Egypt mi khat a that hi. Egypt mipa in a khut sungah teipi tawi hi. Ahih hangin Benaiah ciangkhut khat tawh ama kiangah pai suk a, Egypt-paʼ khut sung panin a teipi sut khia-in ama teipi mah tawh amah a that hi.
verses.22: Jehoiadaʼ tapa Benaiah in hihte hihin, a thahat mi thumteʼ minphatna zah phial a ngah hi.
verses.23: Mihing sawm thumteʼ lakah amah minthang a, ahih hangin amah in mihing thumte ban nai lo hi. David in amah a cingte a ukin a koih hi.
verses.24: Joabʼ sanggampa Asahel zong sawm thumteʼ lakah khat ahi hi. Bethlehem mi Dodoʼ tapa Elhanan,
verses.25: Harod khuami Shammah, Harod khuami Elika,
verses.26: Palti mi Helez, Tekoa khuami Ikkeshʼ tapa Ira,
verses.27: Anathoth khuami Abiezer, Hushah mi Mebunnai,
verses.28: Ahoah mi Zalmon, Netofah khuami Maharai,
verses.29: Netofah khuami Baanahʼ tapa Heleb, Benjamin miteʼ gam sunga om Gibeah khuami Ribaiʼ tapa Ittai,
verses.30: Pirathon khuami Benaiah, Gaash gei-a kuam pan Hiddai,
verses.31: Betharabah khuami Abialbon, Bahurim khuami Azmaveth,
verses.32: Shaalbon khuami Eliahba, Jashenʼ tapate, Jonathan,
verses.33: Harar mi Shammah, Harar mi Shararʼ tapa Ahiam,
verses.34: Maakah khuami Ahasbaiʼ tapa Elifelet, Gilo khuami Ahithofelʼ tapa Eliam,
verses.35: Karmel khuami Hezro, Arbi mi Paarai,
verses.36: Zobah khuami Nathanʼ tapa Igal, Gad mi Bani,
verses.37: Ammon mi Zelek, Zeruiahʼ tapa galhiam a tawi Beeroth khuami Naharai,
verses.38: Ithri mi Ira, Ithri mi Gareb,
verses.39: Hit mi Uriah, a vekpi-in sawm thum le sagih ahi uh hi.
